item.title: California Catholic School Desecrated In Reported Burglary
item.description: A TK-12 Catholic school in Long Beach, California, has suffered major damage after vandals destroyed religious icons in an attack between Sunday night...

item.title: Tulsi Gabbard Providing FBI Oversight Isn’t ‘Dangerous To Our Democracy’
item.description: Democrats want unelected bureaucrats and like-minded 'career' law enforcement agents conducting business with no oversight.

item.title: Schumer Threatens To Shut Down Government So Republicans Can’t Stop Noncitizens From Voting

item.title: Texas Dad Sues California Abortion Pill Supplier For Death Of His Unborn Babies
item.description: The Texas legislature designed the law to combat abortion drug traffickers who illegally mail mifepristone to pro-life states.

item.title: WSJ Anonymous Hit Piece On Gabbard Is Based On Complaints That ‘Weren’t Credible’
item.description: 'Here’s the truth: There was no wrongdoing by @DNIGabbard, a fact that WSJ conveniently buried 13 paragraphs down,' a DNI official said.
